summary: A goofy paperhanger is hired to root out a financial inefficiency on a Hollywood studio lot, wreaking havoc as he goes.
cast: Jerry Lewis|Brian Donlevy|Howard McNear|Dick Wesson|Robert Ivers|Pat Dahl|Renée Taylor|Rita Hayes|Stanley Adams|Kathleen Freeman|Isobel Elsom|Sig Ruman|Felicia Atkins|Doodles Weaver|Fritz Feld|Kenneth MacDonald|Joey Forman|Iris Adrian|Paul Ritts|Mary Ritts|David Landfield|Del Moore|Bellfontevro|Richard Bakalyan|Joe Besser|Theodora Davitt|Milton Frome|Hank Ladd|Mary LeBow|Mike Mahoney|Mickey Manners|Sally Mansfield|Mike Mazurki|Richard Morrow|Bill Richmond|Caroline Richter|Michael Ross|Benny Rubin|Regis Toomey|Mary Treen|Herb Vigran|Jerry Wayne|William Wellman Jr.|The Dover Basketeers|Don Ames|Phil Arnold|Roscoe Ates|Jim Backus|Nicky Blair|Dan Blocker|Boyd Cabeen|Steve Carruthers|Dick Cherney|Harry Cheshire|Leo Durocher|Douglas Evans|Paul Frees|Rudy Germane|Kenneth Gibson|Bob Golden|George Golden|Joe Gray|Lorne Greene|Daryn Hinton|George Holmes|Stuart Holmes|Irving Kaye|Richard LaMarr|Michael Landon|Barry Livingston|King Lockwood|Darlene Lucht|Sol Murgi|George Nardelli|Quinn O'Hara|John Pedrini|'Snub' Pollard|Greg Rhinelander|Pernell Roberts|Mark Russell|Cosmo Sardo|Bernard Sell|George Simmons|Bert Stevens|Hal Taggart|Tim Taylor|Jack Tornek|Arthur Tovey|Judy Whitney|Dick Whittinghill
keywords: written and directed by cast member|satire|physical comedy|slapstick comedy|gag humor
title: Un espía en Hollywood
